ghostPage.title: Testnet Blockchain
ghostPage.excerpt:
What is Testnet?
The DSNP is backed by a blockchain network. Having a testnet allows us to test
different apps without creating any permanent records. Our testnet is open to
the community for experimentation. Please do not use it in earnest. We
periodically destroy the data and do not make any promises about reliability or
consistency.

Get Started
Spin up the Example Client to use the Ethereum Rinkeby and Ropsten testnets.

Example Client [../dev-portal-example-client/]Future Plans

ghostPage.plaintext:
What is Testnet?
The DSNP is backed by a blockchain network. Having a testnet allows us to test
different apps without creating any permanent records. Our testnet is open to
the community for experimentation. Please do not use it in earnest. We
periodically destroy the data and do not make any promises about reliability or
consistency.

Get Started
Spin up the Example Client to use the Ethereum Rinkeby and Ropsten testnets.

Example Client [../dev-portal-example-client/]Future Plans
We are currently in the chain selection process and are planning to have a final
chain selected by Q1-22.
ghostPage.html:
What is Testnet?

The DSNP is backed by a blockchain network. Having a testnet allows us to test different apps without creating any permanent records. Our testnet is open to the community for experimentation. Please do not use it in earnest. We periodically destroy the data and do not make any promises about reliability or consistency.

Get Started

Spin up the Example Client to use the Ethereum Rinkeby and Ropsten testnets.

Example Client

Future Plans

We are currently in the chain selection process and are planning to have a final chain selected by Q1-22.
